sqls.sql: SELECT evaluate_record_no, evaluate_record_status_no, serial_no, me_sn_part_id, trade_no, part_no, part_name, part_spec, part_lot_no, mo_no, refrence_stadard, document_no, document_desc, use_dept_name, test_type, sample_delievry_worker_no, sample_delievry_worker_name, flate_electric_current_value, flate_voltage_value, flate_welding_layer_inner_temp, flate_welding_layer_account, flate_welding_airdot_value, flate_welding_hole_value, flate_welding_residue, flate_welding_dust, flate_electric_arc_stability, flate_splash_situation, flate_welding_seam_surface, flate_welding_residue_fluidity, flate_welding_wire_feed, flateangle_electric_current_value, flateangle_voltage_value, flateangle_welding_layer_inner_temp, flateangle_welding_layer_account, flateangle_welding_airdot_value, flateangle_welding_hole_value, flateangle_welding_residue, flateangle_welding_dust, flateangle_electric_arc_stability, flateangle_splash_situation, flateangle_welding_seam_surface, flateangle_welding_residue_fluidity, flateangle_welding_wire_feed, rectangle_electric_current_value, rectangle_voltage_value, rectangle_welding_layer_inner_temp, rectangle_welding_layer_account, rectangle_welding_airdot_value, rectangle_welding_hole_value, rectangle_welding_residue, rectangle_welding_dust, rectangle_electric_arc_stability, rectangle_splash_situation, rectangle_welding_seam_surface, rectangle_welding_residue_fluidity, rectangle_welding_wire_feed, evaluate_result, welding_technique, weiding_date, confirm_egineer_no, confirm_egineer_name, confirm_date, welding_wire_report_id, welding_wire_report_no, evaluate_record_rmk01, evaluate_record_rmk02, evaluate_record_rmk03, evaluate_record_rmk04, evaluate_record_rmk05, evaluate_record_rmk06, evaluate_record_rmk07, evaluate_record_rmk08, evaluate_record_rmk09, evaluate_record_rmk10, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM qm_evaluate_record WHERE evaluate_record_id = @evaluate_record_id;
